price: 90. Implorez le pardon de votre Seigneur, puis revenez à Lui repentants, car mon Seigneur est Tout Miséricordieux et plein de Dilection. »
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ ثُمَّ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي رَحِيمٞ وَدُودٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfirū rabbakum thumma tūbū ilayhi inna rabbī raḥīmun wadūdun
